## Introduction
SEELab apps can exchange data over local wifi. This is an experimental feature
+ Open the block coding interface on two phones + One of them will show a message at the top which will be something like `IP ADDRESS: PORT>SEELabChat` followed by a `connect` button + Press the connect button + Now both of them should show the message with `SEELabchat` replaced by `client` . They are connected and can exchange data. + Execute the programs and watch readings from one phone being sent to the other and vice versa
